nodes.title: Add optional root path in RestxResource
Allowing to configure router path when using RestxSpecTestsRunner
Change supported source version to remove the warning with Java8
Add project name as colorized prompt if current directory contains a module descriptor
Deployment on Google App Engine Fix #86
Fix : DefaultMessagesTest is system Locale sentitive
Disable some tests to allow running maven build on drone
Add a comparator that allow to give control on test to indicate if 2 obj...
Minor improvements on the admin-ui login page.
Delegate the cookie signing to a Signer component.
Add param context to get locales from http header.
Give a way to user to get current http request.
Syntax error in generated FactoryMachine when method throws several exception
Implements the @Consumes and @Produces annotations (inspired by JAX-RS) for resource methods
Symetry between body content & query param value deserializers, thus adding support for enum types in query params
Some minor improvements in the way spec tests were written
WIP : new documentation page about RESTX Extension Points
$RestxSession special header, more samples in AppModule generated file (app.name, security) & test harness for restx-core-shell
fix typo in DefaultConverters' DateMidnightConverter component name
In addition to #36 here's the proper handling of ProvisionExceptions
Catch Exceptions thrown by a @Provides method and wrap them in ProvisionException
Different RestxSession cookie names for different apps & Optional injectable components support
Removing hard dependency from restx-specs-test to restx-server-jetty, and demonstrating issue #29
Fix for issue #28, fixing security issues on simple server
shade plugin 2.1 is required to add the compatibility with Maven 3.1
Added new test for RestxResourceRoute usage
fix for #23 : provided Optional parameter support in generated code
Updated ide.md to include Maven configuration
Moved 'improve this page' btn in the header, near the 'View on github' banner
Make it more clear Message class is not part of the RESTx API
#316 Allow restx-factory-annotation-processor maven packaging with JDK 11
#314 Allow restx-common maven packaging with JDK 11
Fix jongo string id backward compat (fixes #285)
Fixing Mongo id generation regression in a v0.35.1 release
Configuring type descriptors in service loaders
Handling annotations metadata generation unsupported cases
Remove shell modules from restx distribution
apidocs - removing api-docs relatedOperations when targetting 'string' type
Chrooting on srv/ subdirectory if current directory doesn't contain md.restx.json file on `app run`
Storing parsed representation of module descriptor
shell - replaced hash' md5+bcrypt and sha1+bcrypt by md5#bcrypt and sha1#bcrypt
Allowing to install dependencies from pom.xml or module.ivy file
Allowing non-IOException being thrown by Resources
Fix jetty 8/7 split tests + Introduce WebserverBase class
config - allowing backslash in restx configs, allowing multiline property value
java8 - introduced new restx-jongo-java8 for java8 datetime serialization support
factory - showing dedicated error log when DI cycle is detected.
console - not urlencoding PATH parameters when sending request through restx console
No ResourcesRoute root classpath allowed anymore
By default, use QUERY params for DELETE endpoints parameters, instead of BODY content
Marked ResourceRoute private methods as protected
make RestxAnnotationProcessor reusable for different annotation
Add a request body input handler for String bodies (text/plain).
adds a closeable extension to MongoClient (fixes #193)
Reworked war overlay to depends on ui in a profile
Preparing fields for better query parameters handling
Allow to force injection type for components
Accept name in alternatives, and permits to use Alternative in modules
Allow to plug other cache mechanisms for RestxSession #141 [breaking]
breaking: Makes Warehouse wrappable and implements a FilteredWarehouse wrapper
Allow to set a value prepended to all metrics names which are sent to graphite
added support for the classifier coordinate
Improve generix parameter handling on routes
Improved JongoRepository to support either string or id as credential keys
Added @ObjectId on the userRef field to prevent Mongo from changing it.
